Boaći pred Totenhem: Znamo da su očekivanja velika, ali verujemo
03 Nov 2019, 10:01 by Nemanja
Napadač Crvene zvezde Ričmond Boaći prokomentarisao je prvenstvenu utakmicu sa Proleterom iz Novog Sada, a potom govorio i o predstojećem meču sa Totenhemom.
Golovima Matea Garsije i upravo Ričmonda Boaćija, Crvena zvezda je juče u Novom Sadu bila bolja od Proletera sa 2:0. Napadač iz Gane je istakao da mu je ovaj pogodak, nakon povrede, veoma važan.
– Drago mi je što sam ušao u igru i postigao gol. Svakom fudbaleru je najvažnije da igra, a pogotkom u Novom Sadu sam pokazao da je povreda prošlost. Golovi su ključni za samopouzdanje svakog napadača i želim da budem što efikasniji. Naravno, timski rezultat je najvažniji na kraju, ali prija mi kada se upišem u listu strelaca. Veliki deo posla uradio je Jevtović, iako je ušao samo minut pre čitave akcije. Izborio se za loptu, sjajno mi asistirao i nije mi bilo teško da je sprovedem u mrežu – rekao je Boaći.
Zvezdin golgeter je pohvalio i navijače, koji su u velikom broju ispunili stadion ,,Karađorđe“.

– Uvek je lepo igrati u Novom Sadu. Tribine budu pune naših navijača, stalno se čuje pesma i kada je tako, onda je mnogo lakše igrati. Zahvalio bih se svim zvezdašima koji su bili danas na utakmici, čime je napravljena lepa uvertira za susret sa Totenhemom koji igramo u okviru Lige šampiona. Na terenu nije bilo lako, ali najvažnije je da smo trijumfovali i da je naša mreža mirovala.

Izabranike Vladana Milojevića u sredu očekuje duel sa Totenhemom u okviru četvrtog kola Lige šampiona, a Boaći veruje da njegova ekipa može da ostvari pozitivan rezultat.
– Okrećemo se utakmici sa Totenhemom. Verujemo u sebe i znamo da naši navijači imaju velika očekivanja. Daćemo sve što je u našoj mogućnosti da ostvarimo pozitivan rezultat i uveren sam da ćemo prirediti dobru fudbalsku predstavu – kazao je Boaći.

Facing Tottenham: We know the expectations are high, but we believe
03 Nov 2019, 09:01 by Nemanja
Red Star striker Richmond Boaci commented on the championship game with the Proletarian from Novi Sad, and then spoke about the upcoming match with Tottenham.
With goals by Mate Garcia and just Richmond Boaci, Red Star was better than Proleter 2-0 in Novi Sad yesterday. The Ghanaian striker pointed out that this hit was very important to him after the injury.
- I'm glad I got into the game and scored. The most important thing for every footballer is to play, and especially in Novi Sad I have shown that the injury is a thing of the past. Goals are key to the confidence of every striker and I want to be as efficient as possible. Of course, the team score is the most important in the end, but it pleases me when I get on the shooter list. Much of the work was done by Jevtovic, though he came in just a minute before the whole action. He fought for the ball, assisted me brilliantly and it was not difficult for me to put it into the net - Boaci said.
Zvezda's goalkeeper also praised the fans, who filled the stadium "Karadjordje" in large numbers.

- It's always nice to play in Novi Sad. The stands are full of our fans, the song is constantly heard and when so, it is much easier to play. I would like to thank all the stars who were at the game today for making a nice overture for meeting Tottenham we play within the Champions League. It was not easy in the field, but most importantly, we were triumphant and our network was at a standstill.

Vladan Milojevic's team is expected to face Tottenham on Thursday in the fourth round of the Champions League, and Boaci believes his team can achieve a positive result.
- We turn to the game with Tottenham. We believe in ourselves and know that our fans have high expectations. We will do everything we can to achieve a positive result and I am convinced that we will have a good football show - said Boaci.
